DOC.brief_summary: This study is to determine the clinical and neuroimaging characteristics of Transient Ischemic Attacks in Korean populations.
DOC.brief_title: Korean Transient Ischemic Attack eXpression Registry
DOC.criteria: Clinical symptoms and signs consistent with transient ischemic attack Subject who admitted hospital within 24 hours after symptom onset Subjects who underwent MRI (including diffusionweighted images) and MRA (or CT angiography) Transient neurological symptoms due to Migraine aura Basilar migraine Seizures Syncope Peripheral vertigo Transient global amnesia
